Thesis Presentation Video

18 May 2012

This is the presentation I gave about my master's thesis project at ITP. My project was a semester-long collaboration with Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York. The goal of the project was to investigate and improve the period of rehabilitation that follows a bone marrow transplant. I carried out 6 weeks of detailed research at the hospital, then designed and built a service to encourage patients to remain physically active throughout their treatment.

The slides that accompany the presentation are also available.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in London. See more of Paul's work or get in touch.
